mapper.select: SELECT guest.g_code, cate_name g_nation, g_gender, g_name, g_phone FROM guest LEFT JOIN booking_guest ON guest.g_code = booking_guest.g_code LEFT JOIN category ON guest.g_nation = category.cate_code WHERE boo_code = #{booCode}
SELECT g_code ,g_gender ,g_nation ,e_name e_id ,g_name ,g_birthdate ,g_job ,g_phone ,g_email ,g_date FROM guest LEFT JOIN employee ON guest.e_id = employee.e_id WHERE g_code = #{gCode}
